title.en: Dekiai Zentei, Keiyaku Kon. ~Iwashiro Bengoshi wa Ai ga Deka Sugiru!?~

altTitles.ja: 溺愛前提、契約婚。 ~岩代弁護士は愛がデカすぎる！？~

altTitles.en: Contract Marriage Based on Doting Love ~Iwashiro’s Love Is Too Big~

altTitles.zh-hk: 以溺愛為前提的契約結婚~岩代律師的愛很大

description.en:
After retiring from 3 years of idol activity, Kunihiro Touko decided to focus on live-streaming as her next career. Honestly, she never imagined this kind of future! Touko, who became involved in some trouble, received help from a young lawyer named Iwashiro Yuuji. After briefly meeting, the both of them jumped into a loving relationship. Yuuji, a kind and enchanting gentleman, is a cool beauty and hides his real feelings from Touko…

A doting-couple premise! The former idol Kunihiro Touko and the unfriendly lawyer Iwashiro Yuuji have started a marriage contract?!
description.ja:
「…全部、暴いていいでしょうか？」
アイドルを引退して3年間、国広燈子は芸能界で活動するがライブ配信を中心として生計を立てる日々。
正直こんな未来、ぜんぜん想像してなかった――！
トラブルに巻き込まれた燈子に救いの手を差し伸べてくれたのは岩代悠司と名乗る若手弁護士。
訳あってふたりは恋愛をすっ飛ばして即入籍する流れに！
紳士でやさしい悠司に心惹かれるけどクールビューティすぎて心の内がちょっと見えなくて…。
溺愛前提！　元アイドル国広燈子と不愛想な弁護士岩代悠司はこの度、契約婚はじめました!?

title.en: The Shikisaki Sisters Want to Be Exposed

altTitles.ja: 四季崎姉妹はあばかれたい

description.en: One day, Tarou Yamada, who runs a detective business, slips on a banana peel and reincarnates into Tsukushi Shikisaki, the younger brother of three beautiful big-breasted sisters who will all die on the same day. As he spends time surrounded by the three beautiful sisters, he finds out that the boy he is reincarnated as will be killed by one of the three sisters ...!?
description.ja: 探偵業を営む山田太郎はある日、バナナの皮に足を滑らせてしまい、同日に命を落とした美麗三姉妹の弟・四季崎つくしに転生をしてしまう。美人三姉妹に囲まれて過ごすことになるが、四季崎つくしが三姉妹の誰かに殺されたことに気がついてしまい…!?

altTitles.ja: 彼女のそれにやられてる

altTitles.en: I'm Addicted to Her
I'm Being Done In By Those Things Of Hers

description.en: A gloomy boy suddenly getting close with the popular track and field club ace?! A short comedy about invading someone else's spot to skip class is about to begin!!
description.pt-br: Um rapaz sombrio de repente se aproximando do popular ás do clube de atletismo?! Uma comédia curta sobre invadir o espaço de outra pessoa para escapar das aulas está prestes a começar!!

title.en: You Two are so Close, Are You Dating?

altTitles.ja: 仲いいけどお前ら付き合ってるの？

altTitles.ja-ro: Naka Ii Kedo Omaera Tsukiatteru no?

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.en: His Girlfriend
Someone's Girlfriend

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

altTitles.en: That Guy's Girlfriend

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: I Know How to Deal with Hypnosis Apps!

altTitles.ja: 催眠アプリの対処法わかった!!!!
ツンデレ失敗

altTitles.en: A Girl Who Fails at being Tsundere

title.en: Gakuen Mono no Otome Game no Sekai ni Tensei Shita kedo, Cheat-mochi no Haikei Danshi Seito datta you desu

altTitles.ja: 学園物の乙女ゲームの世界に転生したけど、チート持ちの背景男子生徒だったようです。

altTitles.zh-hk: 我似乎在學園主題的乙女遊戲世界中轉生，但我是一個有外掛的背景男子學生。

altTitles.en: It Seems that I was Reincarnated into the World of a School Otome Game, but I was a Background Male Student with Cheats.

description.en: Kenta, a freelancer, is reincarnated into a world that resembles a school otome game that his sister likes, and he finds himself a male student with a background character. In his reincarnation, Kenta tries his best to improve his living environment as a commoner, Kent, by making his part-time bakery across the street from his house thrive, but for some reason, more and more attractive women start to appear around him.

altTitles.en: The Cost of a Broken Heart
Of Course, I Will Charge You the Consolation Fees!

altTitles.fr: Mais oui, je revendiquerai la compensation!

altTitles.ja: 勿論、慰謝料請求いたします！

altTitles.es: ¡Por supuesto, te cobraré la tarifa de consolación!

altTitles.zh: 当然请给我精神损失费！

altTitles.zh-hk: 當然請給我精神損失費！

description.en: Break my heart, pay the price. "I'm breaking up with you!" My fiancé suddenly declares that he's breaking off our engagement! Apparently, he's got a crush on the countess who just transferred to our school, so now he plans to set me up as a villain to end it between us. So be it! But he'll have to pay me a hefty settlement fee!

title.en: Watashi no Yuri wa Oshigoto desu!

altTitles.en: Yuri Is My Job!

altTitles.th: ลิลีผลิบานเพราะเป็นงานหรอกนะคะ!

altTitles.ja: わたゆり
私の百合はお仕事です！

description.en: Hime is a girl who has developed her cuteness as a deliberate act with the plan of marrying a billionaire. One day, she is more or less forced to work as a replacement for a girl injured by bumping into her in the street. The place of work is a concept cafe where the waitresses put on a show as though the cafe were run by the yuri cliche ojousama school. There's a large contrast between the performances and the off-duty staff.
description.ru:
«Юри — это моя работа!» рассказывает об отношениях между людьми: о зарождении и конце дружбы; о счастье и распрях друзей; о пробуждении любви и её влиянии на рабочую среду; и о самих участниках таких взаимосвязей. Например, о главной героине. Химэ Сираки — невероятно милая школьница, у которой есть мечта: выйти замуж за миллиардера. Стремясь достичь этой цели, она придерживается образа, чтобы нравиться всем.
После неудачного столкновения она ранит Маи Микосибу, которая оказывается управляющей кафе, где обслуживающий коллектив играет роль учащихся школы-интерната для девочек. От чужого давления и желания сохранить репутацию, Химэ приходится согласиться помочь пострадавшей и устроиться официанткой.
Среди персонала ей встречается красивая и изящная Мицуки Аянокодзи. В отличие от других людей, эта соработница не всегда дружелюбна к новенькой. Доброжелательность при посетителях быстро сменяется злостью и криками вне публики, а некомпетентность недавно присоединившейся сотрудницы лишь усугубляет дело. Но вопреки неприязни девушки, Химэ хочет поладить с каждым во что бы то ни стало. Вот только она не догадывается, кем на самом деле является Мицуки.

---

(Source: [shikimori](https://shikimori.one/mangas/104862))

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活

description.en:
A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)
description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

altTitles.ja: わたしの隣のヤンデレくん

altTitles.en: My Yandere Neighbour

description.en:
"My kouhai Kishi-kun appears to be my stalker."
Rika, who works at a production company, is troubled by the presence of her kouhai, Kishi, who seems to hold an abnormal adoration for her.
At the office, he's always looking at her from behind, he notices even the smallest changes, and on top of all that he also turns out to live next door?!
He cares so much about Rika that he can't stop acting in mysterious ways that barely cross the line...! Yandere office love!

altTitles.en: Female Knight Goblin

altTitles.ja: 女騎士ゴブリン

description.en: A Female Knight unexpectedly swaps bodies with the Goblin getting ready to assault her. How will they both deal with this sudden gender and species change?

altTitles.ja: ふたりじめロマンチック

description.en: Kumamori has always been in pursuit of the ideal romance. When she changes classes for her second year of high school, she is unexpectedly reunited with "Tajima," the partner of her first kiss. Unfortunately, he is dry and stoic when it comes to romance.... 200% heartwarming! A realistic but cute and romantic opposites-attract love story!

title.en: Koi ni Koi suru Koibito Kankei

altTitles.ja: 恋に恋するコイビト関係

altTitles.en: Becoming Her Lover For the Sake of Love

description.en:
Asako Ichijou, the student council president at a prestigious girls' high school, has been racking her brain about the ladykiller Nagi Tenma. That's the sort of person Asako is, but Nagi discovers Asako has broken school rules by bringing a shoujo manga to school...

Asako pleads with Nagi to keep it a secret, and Nagi reveals her condition: "Become my lover."

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)

altTitles.ja: 100万回のスキをあげる

altTitles.en: I'll Give You "Love" Ten Thousand Times
100 Blossoms of Love

description.en: During a tournament in middle school, Rui fell in love at first sight with Youhei from the basketball club. I loved, loved, loved him, chasing after Youhei until we finally became lovers. Although we became separated in high school, I would die if it were for Youhei. I was happy as long as they were together…. Or so I thought. I had to study properly and think seriously about my career, but my greedy feelings overflowed and ahhh, the brakes won't work anymore!!

altTitles.en: An A-Ranked Adventurer’s “Slow-living”

altTitles.ja: Ａランク冒険者のスローライフ

description.en: Aldred, the leader of a kingdom’s A-ranked party,『Black Silver』, has accomplished the task of slaying a dragon. However, he who has pursued strength his whole life has lost sight of his goal from taking down a monster of the strongest species. As he worried about what to do next in his life, it was the scenery of Nordende that popped up in his mind; A rural village by the countryside, full of natural beauty, which he only visited once during a quest in the past. After declaring the disbandment of his party, he heads towards Nordende for a comfortable, relaxing life.
description.pt-br: O DragonSlayer Aldred é o aventureiro nº 1 de Rank-A e também o líder de um grupo de outros Rank-A do reino de Avalonia, que após cumprir a tarefa de eliminar um dragão decide desfazer o grupo. Para quem sempre buscou a força não querendo ser o melhor mas sim para poder sobreviver. Após conseguir o título de nº 1 e não precisar mais de dinheiro. Aldred decide viver sua vida e o lugar que escolheu, uma vila pequena que visitou a 9 anos durante uma de suas missões chamada de Nordende. Nodende é uma vila rural, cheia de belezas naturais e bem longe do reino de Avalonia que para Aldred seria perfeito onde ninguém saberia que ele é o Rank-A nº 1. Após desfazer o grupo. Aldred parte em sua viagem até Nordende, para poder viver uma vida confortável e relaxante e principalmente sem muitos problemas.

title.en: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.ja: お互いどんどんハマっていく教育係と新入社員

altTitles.ja-ro: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.en: The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other

title.en: How to Gracefully Divorce a Dragon

altTitles.en: How to Divorce a Dragon Beautifully

description.en:
Twenty-year-old Jeong Seyun, a rabbit descendant, knows that dragons are considered the chaebols of the beast world. But she'd rather have a relationship based on love than an arranged marriage with a dragon. And as fate would have it, as soon as she enters college, she falls in love with fox descendant Kim Hangyeol at first sight! She musters up the courage to confess, but... to the wrong person?!
Will Seyun's dream of a romance come true? (Summary adapted from Kakaopage.)

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール角明

description.en: The story in Dragon Ball Kakumei picks up right after the Tournament of Power and deals with the consequences of Android 17 restoring the erased universes. In addition to the six universes destroyed by Zeno, the wish brought back Universe 19, which has warriors that are powerful enough to take down Zeno and the angels.
description.pt-br:
“Quando o desejo do Androide 17 no final do Torneio do Poder leva o mundo a uma Guerra Multiversal, aliados de todos os universos terão que se fortalecer para enfrentar divindades malignas e, desta vez, eles terão que defender todos sem Goku”.

Criado pelos franceses Darkows (roteiro), Reenko (roteiro) e Poissonlabo (desenhista), Dragon Ball Kakumei é um mangá não oficial que conta uma história alternativa se caso o desejo do Androide 17, ao fim do Torneio do Poder, restaurasse os 18 universos que existiam originalmente, levando a uma Guerra Multiversal entre grandes divindades, mas sem a presença de Son Goku.

Com uma arte atípica, em se tratando de um mangá feito por fãs (que geralmente costumam tentar emular os traços de Akira Toriyama), além de uma história com uma narrativa e proposta bem diferente da leveza e simplicidade da obra original, Dragon Ball Kakumei é, sem dúvidas, um dos mangás não oficiais de Dragon Ball mais famosos, ao lado de outros projetos de fãs como Dragon Ball AF e Dragon Ball Multiverse.

altTitles.ja: 怪獣８号 side B

description.en: Front-line stories of the Defense Force not covered in the main series!

title.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attacks

altTitles.zh: 我的假女友正全力防御她们的进攻

altTitles.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attack
My Fake Girlfriends are using me as a Shield

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Jia Nüyou Zheng Quanli Fangyu Tamen De Jingong

description.en: One day, I was suddenly confessed to by a girl, and in order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!

altTitles.ja: お忍び同棲

altTitles.en: Living With a Kunoichi

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

title.en: Akagi: The Genius Who Fell Into Darkness

altTitles.ja: アカギ－闇に降り立った天才
闘牌伝説アカギ 闇に舞い降りた天才

description.en: The year is 1958, in the midst of a period of rapid economic growth. One rainy night at a mahjong parlor, Nangou, who was challenging the yakuza to a life-threatening game, was gradually being pushed into a corner. Suddenly, a soaking wet boy walks into the parlor. Nangou senses something extraordinary in him, and asks the boy, who has never even held a mahjong tile before, to play in his place. This is when the legend began. The boy's name was Akagi Shigeru, later known as the "Man of the Divine Realm."

altTitles.ja: 彼岸のオルカ

altTitles.en: Orca on the Other Side

description.en: Marlin Trout  is an organization established to stop suicides in Japan, where the number of suicides has drastically increased due to the development of society. Wakame, a slightly natural staff member, is constantly pushed around by her uncooperative partner, Umi. They are the best buddies with the best record, but they have a certain "history" together...?

title.en: A High School With Only Men

altTitles.en: Boys Only
Namgo
Namgodeokbbun
MAO

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

altTitles.ja: 卒業

description.en: Her graduation

altTitles.en: Bad Maids

description.en: Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

altTitles.ja: のあ先輩はともだち。

altTitles.en: Noa Is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

description.en: Kuroki Tomoko is a super popular, high school girl, who has had 50 years of dating experience, and 100 boys… in the Otome game world. In the real world, she is a 15 year old loner, who has all of the qualities of a "mojo." However, when school isn't going as she expected, and she isn't as popular as she had thought she was, she takes a look at herself in the mirror for the first time in a few years, and has some shocking revelations…
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.

title.en: Yuutousei wa Mi no Hodo Shirazu

altTitles.ja: 優等生は身のほど知らず

altTitles.en: The Honors Student Doesn't Know His Place

description.en:
Shougetsu, an honors student at the top of his grade, discovers the wonders of developing his backside. One day, a student from the same grade, Kyoujima, sees him anal masturbating in a classroom after school. In exchange for his silence, Kyoujima tells him to continue what he was doing...?!

A curiosity-filled high-schoolers' pleasure study love!!

altTitles.ja: 見せたがりの露乃ちゃん

altTitles.zh-hk: 想要給別人看的露乃醬

altTitles.en: Tsuyuno-chan Likes to Show Off
Tsuyuno-chan Who Wants To Show Off

description.en:
A little boy who has an armpit fetish and a high school girl who loves male attention and exposing herself so much so that she doesn't care who it is. When she notices that he has stalked her to her basketball game, she decides it wouldn't be bad to indulge him more.  
  
**Raw: [**[ComicBunch](https://www.comicbunch.com/manga/mon/tsuyunochan/) **|** [KurageBunch](https://kuragebunch.com/episode/13933686331653721909) **|** [NicoNicoBunch](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/47585)**]**

altTitles.ja: バディゴ！

altTitles.en: Buddy Go!

description.en: Shizuku Ishiai, a 2nd year middle school student, loves dancing, but is bad at expressing herself, so she crossdresses and posts videos of her dances on the popular website "Smile Douga," under the alias "Ai." And she had declared the "dancing prince," Hayate, her rival. But, after a few unexpected events, and her attempts to best him, she's somehow thrown into an idol unit with him; furthermore, a MALE one?!

title.en: Yuusha Party wo Tsuihousareta Hakuma Doushi, S Rank Boukensha ni Hirowareru ~Kono Hakuma Doushi ga Kikakugai Sugiru~

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティーを追放された白魔導師、Sランク冒険者に拾われる ～この白魔導師が規格外すぎる～

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha Party o Tsuihousareta Hakuma Doushi, S Rank Boukensha ni Hirowareru ~Kono Hakuma Doushi ga Kikakugai Sugiru~

altTitles.en: The White Mage Who was Banished from the Hero's Party is Picked up by an S Rank Adventurer: This White Mage is Too Out of the Ordinary!

description.en: One day, Lloyd, a white mage, is banished from the hero’s party. Lloyd, who has lost his job, happens to accompany an S-rank party on a quest by chance. At that time, no one knew that the hero’s party would collapse and Lloyd would gain fame - yet. This is the story of an extraordinary support magic-user who thinks he is normal, becomes an adventurer, while he is unaware of how he eventually becomes peerless.
description.pt-br: Um dia, Lloyd, um mago branco, é banido da festa do herói. Lloyd, que perdeu o emprego, por acaso acompanha um grupo de rank S em uma missão. Naquela época, ninguém sabia que o partido do herói entraria em colapso e Lloyd ganharia fama - ainda. Esta é a história de um extraordinário usuário de magia de suporte que pensa que é normal, torna-se um aventureiro, embora não saiba como eventualmente se torna incomparável.

altTitles.ja: 異形頭さんとニンゲンちゃん

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

title.en: Isekai Ooku de JK wa Koi o Suru

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Oooku de JK wa Koi o Suru

altTitles.en: A JK Falls in Love in the Depths of Another World

altTitles.ja: 異世界大奥でJKは恋をする

description.en:
16 year old Himeno Shion has never experienced love. Unfortunately, she suddenly hit by a truck and gets transported no another world!

[Do you want to all in love?]

Right when she's about be eaten by a dragon, she gets saved by handsome hero named Ars. After bring Shion to his castle, Dragonia, she discovers that he wants to gather a harem girls from other races!?

altTitles.ja: デビルマンサーガ

description.en: Set in 2025, a roboticist named Fudou Yuuki joins a project involving a large mural depicting humanity's true past as well as the ancient but advanced technology found in Antarctica.

title.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.en: Genshiken: Second Season

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

altTitles.ja: 訳アリ心霊マンション

altTitles.en: Welcome Ghost Mansion

altTitles.ja: 弟の夫

description.en:
Ten years ago Yaichi's twin brother moved to Canada and married a man called Mike. A month ago, he died.  
  
Now Mike has arrived in Japan to meet Yaichi and his daughter Kana. Yaichi has to face his own preconceptions and come to terms with who his brother really was.  
  
[Official English](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/545416/my-brothers-husband-volumes-1-and-2-by-gengoroh-tagame/)

Adapted to [Live Action](https://www.cinra.net/article/column-201803-otoutonootto) in 2018.

---
- **Won the 19th Japan Media Arts Festival Division Excellence Award in 2015**
- **Won the 47th Japan Cartoonists Association Excellence Award in 2018**
description.uk:
Звичайнісінький день Яїчі Оріґучі перериває кремезний іноземець, який з'являється перед дверима і обіймає його. Чоловік представляється Майком Фленаґаном, і Яїчі швидко дізнається, що Майк — вдівець Рьоджі, його молодшого брата-близнюка. Відтоді як Рьоджі виїхав до Канади десять років тому Яїчі не чув про нього нічого, окрім того, що він одружився з іноземцем і помер місяць тому.

У той час як Яїчі занепокоєний, його маленька донька Кана в захваті від ідеї мати дядька-ґея з Канади. Нерозуміння Каною поглядів японського суспільства на гомосексуальність змушує Яїчі замислитися над власними упередженими уявленнями. І поки Майк продовжує жити в родині, Яїчі поступово дізнається більше про свого зятя і згадує своє минуле з Рьоджі.
description.pt-br: Há dez anos, o irmão gêmeo de Yaichi acabou se mudando para o Canadá. Como os dois não conversavam tanto, a viagem ao exterior só ajudou a aumentar a distância entre eles. Um mês atrás, Yaichi recebeu a notícia do falecimento de seu irmão e, pouco tempo depois, ele recebe a visita de Mike, seu cunhado. Ele viajou ao Japão para conhecer a família e os lugares de que o seu falecido marido tanto falava. Embora relutante, a família o recebe e Yaichi não só confronta os seus preconceitos com relação à homossexualidade, como também conhece um outro lado do seu irmão e passa a acompanhar como a próxima geração pode lidar com tais questões.

altTitles.ja: 蠱毒の家

altTitles.en: Poisoner Home

description.en: Tateyuki Chono is devastated when his apartment and extensive collection of insect specimens burns to the ground one evening. But his luck turns around when a chance leads him to meet famed entomologist Izumo Kusanagi. Chono is floored by the kind hospitality of Kusanagi and his beautiful daughter Toko. However, the warm atmosphere of the estate belies a sinister secret. What is the true nature of Dr. Kusanagi’s research? And is Chono already trapped in a deadly web of terror?
description.vi: Chono là một sinh viên đại học có niềm đam mê côn trùng và làm mẫu vật côn trùng. Một ngày nọ, khi cậu về nhà sau ca làm thêm thì thấy chung cư mình ở bị cháy và cậu mất toàn bộ đống mẫu vật quý giá. Trùng hợp làm sao, cậu đã gặp Kusanagi Izumo, một nhà côn trùng học và là tác giả của một trong những cuốn sách yêu thích của cậu. Cậu được Izumo mời đến nhà với ý muốn giúp đỡ cậu. Ở đấy, Chono đã gặp một cô gái xinh đẹp tên Toko. Tuy nhiên, có một bí mật khủng khiếp trong ngôi nhà mà Chono đặt chân đến...

title.en: Duel Masters LOST: Crystal of Remembrance

altTitles.ja: Duel Masters LOST ～追憶の水晶～

description.en: A new “Duel Masters” story begins! Kirifuda Win, who has lost all memories of his past, is now living alone in Tokyo. In the midst of his ordinary daily life, the footsteps of the world’s end gradually begin to draw near. The secret of Win’s hidden past is…?

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん 外伝

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun - Kalego Gaiden
Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun - Kalego Side Story

description.en: A special, two-part side story manga set in the world of *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun*, focusing on Naberius Kalego during his days as a student of Babyls Demon School.

altTitles.en: 爆宠小萌妃

description.en: This is a story about: a female lead who transforms into a child after losing her virginity, her identity switches between an adult and a kid. With the crown prince who has a dual personality too, there's equal parts love and bite.

altTitles.en: The Stray and the Weeds

altTitles.ja: ノラと雑草

altTitles.vi: Kẻ lang thang và nhành cỏ dại

description.en:
The place where I belong is with you.  
A runaway girl who knows no hope. A middle-aged detective who has lost hope. Through their meeting, this hopelessness begins to melt away.  
  
Following the death of his daughter, Assistant Inspector Yamada Hajime has lost hope in everything, and jobs like closing under-aged prostitution rings don't exactly help matters. But there he meets a girl who looks alarmingly like his late daughter. Her name is Umino Shiori, a runaway girl who's desperate enough to sell herself to escape her house but won't tell anyone why.
description.vi:
Đứa trẻ bơ vơ chẳng biết hy vọng. Thanh tra lạc lõng chẳng còn ước mong. Rồi họ gặp nhau, và nỗi vô vọng này bắt đầu tan biến.

Sau cái chết của con gái, phó thanh tra Yamada Hajime đã mất hy vọng vào tất cả mọi thứ, và công việc triệt phá các ổ mại dâm cũng không xoa dịu được ông là bao. Nhưng rồi một ngày kia, ông gặp một người trông hệt như đứa con đã mất. Tên cô bé là Umino Shiori, một cô gái vì muốn chạy thoát khỏi nhà mình mà đã tuyệt vọng đến nỗi đi bán thân, thế nhưng Umino lại chẳng bao giờ kể cho bất kỳ ai lý do vì sao mình làm thế.
